definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
lit. surging waters flooded the Dragon King temple (idiom)/fig. to fail to recognize a familiar person/a dispute between close people who fail to recognize each other
pinyin: da4 shui3 chong1 le5 Long2 Wang2 miao4

sentences.english: Thus, before the property management of residence turned off the valve, my grandmother's house was flooded.
sentences.chinese: 於是乎，在物業把總閥門關掉之前，姥姥家發大水了。

sentences.english: Have a child accidentally fell into the flood tank.
sentences.chinese: 有個小朋友不小心，掉到大水缸裏了。

sentences.english: The statue is a large pool below.
sentences.chinese: 雕像下面是一個大水池。

sentences.english: The travellers knowing about the floods took another road.
sentences.chinese: 知道發大水的那些遊客改道走了。

sentences.english: They suffered badly during the flood.
sentences.chinese: 發大水時，他們受了不少罪。

sentences.english: Around the great fountain, the earth was already dried up to the point of being burnt.
sentences.chinese: 大水池周圍，地幹得象是烤焦了一樣。

sentences.english: The next station is Tai Shui Hang.
The authors briefly depicted the development features of mudflow hazard in Dashuiqing gully in Binchuan County.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了賓川縣大水箐泥石流災害的發育特徵。

sentences.english: Eight months ago the water itself prepared the place for it.
sentences.chinese: 八個月前，大水還佔據着現在紀念館的位置。

sentences.english: "Dashui" is common worship in Chu bamboo slips as an important deity.
sentences.chinese: “大水”是出土楚簡所載較普遍祭祀的重要神祇。

sentences.english: The first flood was useless. God doesn't want to start a second one.
sentences.chinese: 第一次大水沒有用，上帝不想再發第二次了。

sentences.english: The crops were washed away by the flood.
In the middle of the day he found two minnows in a large pool.
sentences.chinese: 中午時分，他在一個大水坑裏發現了兩條鰷魚。

sentences.english: Thou didst walk through the sea with thine horses, through the heap of great waters.
sentences.chinese: 你乘馬踐踏紅海，就是踐踏洶湧的大水。

sentences.english: Sliding occurred in the slope side of spillway on the right bank after the spillway was excavated.
sentences.chinese: 大水溝水庫溢洪道開挖後，右岸邊坡發生了滑動失穩。

sentences.english: Last year the flood ruined all our rice paddy.
sentences.chinese: 去年，大水把我的所有的稻田都沖毀了。

definition: (of a watercourse) to breach its banks/(of a dam) to burst
